ModMetaData.name: Natural Lakes
ModMetaData.author: RadZerp
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that adds buildable lakes to the game.
This is an addon to Natural Paths. If you want this mod without Natural Paths you can subscribe to my other mod, Lakes.
Stats - Cost: Nothing - Work to build: 256 - Walk speed: 30% - Terrain requirement: Diggable - Beauty: 2
README: The only way to remove the lake after it has been built is by placing a moisture pump, just like the shallow water in vanilla.
